forum.content:
Damn, Damn, Damn,
What I'd do to have you
here, here, here
I wish you were here.
Damn, Damn, Damn
What I'd do to have you
near, near, near
I wish you were here.

I love the way you are
It's who I am,
don't have to try hard
We always say,
say like it is
And the truth is that I really miss


該死的，到底要怎麼樣才能一直在你身邊？
forum.title: I wish you were here....
